casebody.data:
In the Matter of Howard Neil SHIPLEY. No. D-2827. Supreme Court of the United States March 23, 2015.

Opinion

A response having been filed, the Order to Show Cause dated December 8, 2014, is discharged. All Members of the Bar are reminded, however, that they are responsible-as Officers of the Court-for compliance with the requirement of Supreme Court Rule 14.3 that petitions for writs of certiorari be stated "in plain terms," and may not delegate that responsibility to the client.
